text: Kakujin ni wa, mae kara mo ushirokara mo,-ji kara tsugini (tenshi) ga tsuite ite, arrā no o meirei ni yori kanshi shite iru. Hontōni arrā wa, hito ga mizukara kaenai kagiri, kesshite hitobito (no unmei) o kae rarenai. Daga arrā ga (ichido) hitobito ni sainan o kudasou to o nozomi ni nareba, sore wa kesshite yokeru koto wa dekinai. Kare-ra ni wa, kare no soto ni gādian wa nai nodearu
